en: You've stumbled across an app suite that seems like it'll help your productivity. Organized checklists and calendar events dance in front of your eyes. Buy it and give it a shot?
It makes you a bit more productive for a week, but you can't seem to figure out how to get the complex mechanics to work for what you want to do. Still, at least it helped a bit!
You've been down this path before. Organization apps tend to distract you more than help your productivity, so you pass.
